name: Mafia's Drive-Thru
description:
Hard times have come. Inflation, financial crisis, crypto going down, harsh weather condition, growing pandemic. Hard times to live in, but we have to power through them. Together…

Even the Mafia needs new ways of earning money, even if they may be unethical. Harvesting dead bodies for organs was a new business hidden away from the public. With a spread of Divoc-91 piles of corpses were growing giving more opportunities.

You’ve been kidnapped. You’re in the middle of the operations doing a dirty work for mafia.

Task is simple. Harvest bodies for body parts, pack them into boxes and send away following orders on the ticket.

But be aware of a timer, fresh product is a good product. Also, don’t waste anything, your boss is very strict!

Good luck, you are gonna need it!

TEAM:

  • Krzysztof Tomaszek - Game Designer/Programmer/Script Writer
  • Jakub Szpyra - Game Designer/Music Director/Graphic Designer

CONTROLS

  • Left mouse click - Drag and drop organs
  • A/D - Rotate organs

INSTRUCTIONS

Your task is to move organs from bodies on the left and pack them into boxes on the right. They have to fit withing a box and not overlap with each other, so make sure to plan ahead to not run out of room. Use rotation to your advantage!

To complete an order, left-click on the ticket you want to return, and it will automatically close a box for you, generate a new ticket and box for you to work with.

Make sure to keep an eye on a timer below every ticket. If you run out of time, your boss won’t be very happy, and you’ll soon be ridding the same conveyor belt as others.
